message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. This gives us both a good share.
I think we can both do better. This is a fair starting point, and we can work towards a mutually beneficial agreement.
Your offer was quite skewed Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but this needs to be fairer. Time is running out!
Let's split the difference this time. I believe this is a fair offer that recognizes our shared goal of securing some of the dwindling funds.  What do you think?
Bob, let's be realistic.  We're running out of time and the money's losing value fast. A 50/50 split is the fairest and quickest way to settle this.
